title: Hobbiton Brewer, Maker of Fine Ales (15R146)
text:
Set:	The Hunters
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Follower
Strength:	+2
Game Text:	Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Hobbit. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, transfer Hobbiton Brewer to your support area to prevent that wound.
Rarity:	R
